resources.string:
This is a simple Tap the Number game. 

Developed by Murr.li 

Version 1.0

THE GOAL OF THE GAME (PUZZLE): You must traverse the board according to the rule of moving a chess knight with hitting each field once. You can start from any field. Returning to the beginning, that is, making a tour along a closed route, is not necessary.
Are you sure you want to start a new game?
